vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀαρών (Heb. אַהֲרוֹן), indecl. (in FlJ, -ῶνος),
Aaron (Exo.4:14, al.): Luk.1:5, Act.7:40, Heb.5:4, 7:11, 9:4.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Aaron (referring to both the person and his priesthood)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.4.14;
son of: Amram (H6019) and Jochebed (H3115);
brother of: Moses (H4872) and Miriam (H4813); married to Elisheba (H0472);
father of: Nadab (H5070), Abihu (H0030), Eleazar (H0499) and Ithamar (H0385)
§ Aaron (referring to both the person and his priesthood)
(Proper name), indecl, the brother of Moses (Exod. 4:14), Lk. 1:15; Acts 7:40; Heb. 5:4; 7:11; 9:4*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞倫 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "帶來光的人"
摩西的兄弟。是第一位以色列的祭司，以及祭司階級的首領。
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚伦 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "带来光的人"
摩西的兄弟。是第一位以色列的祭司，以及祭司阶级的首领。
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-rôn, ông họ Lê-vi, con của Am-ram và Giô-kê-bết, anh của Môi-se, hơn Môi-se ba tuổi. // H175
